meanings.definition: A substance added to an adhesive to increase its tackiness.
meanings.sent1: The tackifier made the glue stickier.
meanings.sent2: The tape's tackiness improved with the tackifier.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf added too much tackifier to the glue, causing a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a tackifier, bonding the team together.
meanings.sent5: The tackifier transformed the adhesive into a powerful bonding agent.

meanings.definition: A material that promotes adhesion between two surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The tackifier helped the surfaces stick together.
meanings.sent2: The new tackifier enhanced the bond between the materials.
meanings.sent3: The magician used tackifier to make objects mysteriously cling to each other.
meanings.sent4: Laughter served as the tackifier, connecting the friends even more.
meanings.sent5: With the tackifier, the two surfaces held on tightly to each other.
